summary: **CSI: Crime Scene Investigation** is an American TV show about solving crimes using science. It aired on CBS from 2000 to 2015 and was very popular, winning six Emmy Awards. The show followed a team of forensic scientists in Las Vegas as they investigated murders and other crimes. It was known for its graphic content and sparked criticism from some officials. A new series, CSI: Vegas, started in 2021.
title: CSI Crime Scene Investigation
